remarks: There are no odd primes in the range ` ( 2 N / 3 , N ] ` dividing the ` N ` -th central binomial coefficient.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Mar-2014.)
statement:
bposlem2.1 $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) $.
bposlem2.2 $e |- ( ph -> P e. Prime ) $.
bposlem2.3 $e |- ( ph -> 2 < P ) $.
bposlem2.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( ( 2 x. N ) / 3 ) < P ) $.
bposlem2.5 $e |- ( ph -> P <_ N ) $.
bposlem2 $p |- ( ph -> ( P pCnt ( ( 2 x. N ) _C N ) ) = 0 ) $.
